messages.subject: Granddaddy Longlegs Info Request
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all! I wanted to follow up my intro with an info request, so thought I d put this in a seperate e-mail:) I m on a quest. The guys have been asking all these
messages.messageBody:
Hi all!
I wanted to follow up my intro with an info request, so thought I'd put
this in a seperate e-mail:)
I'm on a quest. The guys have been asking all these interesting
questions about Granddaddy Longlegs (eight-legged harvesters, not the
cranefly type) and I have been having an awful time finding any info. Most
of the library books on spiders we've read in the last couple of years, or
at least skimmed, and few even mention them. I checked our central library
childrens department, and the librarian and I ended up using an encyclopedia
to get any info at all!:p I don't mind, but the guys thought it kinda
dry...
Does anyone have any favorite books or web-sites (or videos, or
what-ever) that they could recommend??
TIA!
Tamara
ps - please forgive me if this is a duplicate for anyone....

"I would be most happy if my children grew up to be the
kind of people who think decorating consists of building
enough bookshelves." -- Anna Quindlen
